text: Hi all, I'm trying to add stop losses to my bot. I'm wondering if it's possible to add a back bet at less than the market rate, so if the market ever falls to that level it will automatically get matched? - is this or any other stop loss type method possible on the betfair API?

elements.text: Hi all, I'm trying to add stop losses to my bot. I'm wondering if it's possible to add a back bet at less than the market rate, so if the market ever falls to that level it will automatically get matched? - is this or any other stop loss type method possible on the betfair API?
